attributes.action: To increase funding for school meals for children in Buckinghamshire
attributes.additional_details: I would be very happy if you would help start this petition up as I think it's very unfair that many friends and families of mine there children have received up to more than 100 percent in school meal vouchers for the holidays
attributes.background: I want to start a petition to increase funding for school children in the school holidays as he in Buckinghamshire where I live in Aylesbury Buckinghamshire it has been reduced by up to and over 100 percent

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

It's not clear if you are concerned about funding for school meals, or provision of meals for children during school holidays.

We can’t accept petitions that request action at a local level, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase funding for free school meals and issue meal vouchers during holidays: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/633699

Extend the holiday activities and food programme to all children: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640769

Fund free school meals for all primary and secondary schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/633697

If you're concerned about funding for school meals in your area you could raise this with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
